pkgmetadata.longdescription: Warnes and Raftery's MCGibbsit MCMC diagnostic // 'mcgibbsit' provides an implementation of Warnes Raftery's MCGibbsit run- length diagnostic for a set of (not-necessarily independent) MCMC samplers. It combines the estimate error-bounding approach of the Raftery and Lewis MCMC run length diagnostic with the between verses within chain approach of the Gelman and Rubin MCMC convergence diagnostic.
